name: CryptoLive
description: A live CryptoCurrency tracker built using Angular 10, Angular Material, HighCharts, and the CoinRanking API.

name: Brewery Finder
description: This project was created with React, Bootstrap, and the Open Brewery DB API. This was my first open source project, which provided me the opportunity to sharpen my Git skills.

name: Where Is the ISS
description: Want to see where the International Space Station is in real time? Check it out here.

name: Motivational Cats
description: I created this at the end of October 2019 to see how many pull requests I would get since the end of Hacktoberfest was near. Built with vanilla JS and Bulma CSS.

name: Weather Vue
description: This is my first Vue project/ This project utilizes the OpenWeatherMap api, Vuex, HighCharts, and Vuetify to bring daily weather, a five day forecast, as well as a live map.

name: CrazyPlantPerson
description: Keep track of your plants with this handy plant log. Built with Vue 2, Firebase, Vuex, and Vuetify.
